name: twitter-scraper
description: Advanced Twitter scraper with real-time progress updates

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && mkdir -p dist/static && cp static/style.css dist/static/
scripts.build:windows: if not exist dist mkdir dist && copy index.html dist\ && if not exist dist\static mkdir dist\static && copy static\style.css dist\static\

author: Your Name
